title: Snow armor
summaries: The Snow armor (on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile) is an armor set consisting of the Snow Hood, Snow Coat, and Snow Pants.

On [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile, wearing the full set grants a total of 9 defense as well as immunity to the Chilled and Frozen debuffs. It can be mixed freely with the Pink Snow armor and will still grant this set bonus. Each piece has a 3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance to be dropped by Frozen Zombies.

On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader, the set is called Eskimo armor, consisting of the Eskimo Hood, Eskimo Coat, and Eskimo Pants. Each piece has a 0.67*1/150 (0.67%) to be dropped by Zombie Eskimos. Wearing the full set grants a total of 4 defense and no set bonus. Due to its low defense and high rarity, its viability as an armor set is rather low.
